title: Can't log in to League of Legends since patch 4.21.

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body:
Ever since the new patch 4.21, I can't log into League of Legends. Whenever I open the launcher and click "Launch" I wait for a minute or so but the log-in client never shows up. Every now and then I can get to the log-in part after I try starting the client 50 odd times with a combination of Task Manager/terminating multiple client processes. I don't know if that has anything to do with getting the log-in client up but it seems to be the only thing to work. Unfortunately now, for two days, nothing I do gets the log-in client up.

If I do manage to get the log-in client up it's fine from then on. I have no problems logging in or playing the game. Just getting to the log-in client is the struggle. I've never had any other technical issues with the game before this. I've tried repairing from the launcher client and just recently reinstalled the game, yet I still can't get in. Help would be mostly appreciated, thank you.

replies.body: I'm getting a very similar problem, once I click 'Launch' it just has a loading circle next to cursor for 3 seconds then nothing... in processes it says its running. Formatted too with no luck. I found rebooting helps, I can usually launch the game once, but if I close and reopen the launch bug happens.
After I press the launch the login comes up but when i login it says logging in forever then it says connection error
I have the same problem too.
i cant log on my profile too

You've reinstalled the game, so that means there is something stuffing up with the way your PC is connecting to the League login servers. Don't know how much that means, though it eliminates any hardware/corrupt file issues.

Make sure your OS is updated and try fiddling around with your internet settings, that is if you know what you're doing. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues This is a good place to start.
I have the same problem, except even if I do get it to work I still can't log in to the game. It says connection failed.
